12112211.content:
The frog flew over to where a pair of teachers, Midori Hibiki and Fonda Fontaine were talking. It flew through them, and then returned to its card. There was then a bright flash for an instant. When the flash cleared, there was an apparent difference.

Jaden now wore the Academy's uniform for Slifer Girls with a white sleeveless blazer with red trimming, though you couldn't see it under the red coat with a long back her wore over it. He also had on a red miniskirt and red high-heeled. boots. The clothes he wore were the ones that belonged to Midori Hibiki, the teacher that was head of the Slifer Red Girls dorm, though it was really only a tilte since there was only one Red dorm currently.

Syrus now wore a white blazer with blue trimming, and it was open to reveal the pink dress he now wore. He also had on a pair of brown high-heeled boots. He was dressed in the clothes of Fonda Fontaine, the school's PE teacher, head nurse, and head of the Obelisk Blue Girls.

As for the teachers whose clothes they were wearing, Midori was now wearif the red Slifer blazer and a pair of jeans, the uniform of the boys in Slifer Red. And Fonda was wearing a yellow blazer and pants, the uniform for the boys in Ra Yellow.

But the frog hadn't swapped their clothes. It had really swapped their occupations. So while Midori and Fonda were now students in the Slifer and Ra boys dorms, Jaden and Syrus were now teachers instead of students, and were the heads of the girls for Red and Blue, plus Syrus was the school nurse.

As Jaden and Syrus stepped into the store the Swap Frog spirit left its card again to perform a swap. There was a right flash when it returned, but it died down quickly.

Instead of Ms Dorothy and Sadie, Chazz and Jesse were now behind the counter instead. Both were also dressed in pink shirts, red ribbon tie, and dark blue miniskirt. It was the uniform for the school store.

Once again, the Swap Frog had swapped ocupation, this time between Chazz and Jesse with Ms. Dorothy and Sadie. Chazz now ran the school store, and Jesse was his assistant, and the people they had swapped with were now students.

"Hey Jesse, Hey Chazz." Jaden greeted them.

"Hey Jaden. How is it going?" Jesse asked. Chazz was too busy helping some students and doing some sales to respond, though he did nod in acknowledgemt to him.

"Its going alright. Classes have been fine, and I haven't had any problems with my students."

"Sounds good."

"Anyway, Jaden we should get going." Syrus said. "We've got a meeting with the Chancellor soon that we've got to get to."

12112211211.content:
As the two walked down the hall, the frog flew out of the card, and went elsewhere. It didn't return for several minutes. When it did, there was a flash as the swap took place, though Jaden and Syrus took no notice of it.

The two entered the Chancellor's office, and inside the Chancellor was talking with a few teachers and the Chairman of the school's Disciplinary Action Squad about a few things. But instead of the older man, it was a much younger girl than him sitting at the desk and dressed in his uniform. And the teachers were also different than who they would normally be as well. But all the peope present were familiar ones. The frog had been busy, and done several moe occupation swaps.

Alexis was now the Chencellor of the Academy, while Sheppard was only a student, and in the girls dorm, no less. Jasmine and Mindy were now teachers as well, having swapped with Professor Sartyr and Doctor Crowler respectively, which meant they were also the heads of the Ra and Obelisk boys dorms, while the two former teachers were now students in the Obelisk girls dorm in their place. Hassleberry was now the chairman of the Disciplinary Action Squad, and wore the green uniform of the one he had swapped with, the green coat, miniskirt, beret, and high-heeled boots. And Blair had been swapped with a teacher as well, though it was only one of the regular ones.

It was rather amusing, as now the core faculty of the Academy were now students, and the students now had their jobs. Of course, no one actually knew this, and things were completely normal as far as anyone was concerned.

"Ah, you two are finally here." Alexis said.

"What did we miss?" Syrus asked.

"Nothing much. The meeting just started." Mindy said.

"The meeting isn't about much. Just a few minor things that need to be taken care of." Alexis said.

1412121121.content:
As the bright light died down, differences were readily apparent. Their clothes had somehow swapped and they were all dressed in someone elses clothes, resized to fit them.

Yuma now was dressed in Anna's pink and white dress and black shorts, her boots, and her hair clips. Shark now wore Cathy's black gothic lolita style dress that had a bell on the collar and a cat's tail on the back of it it, black glothes with pink fingernails, knee-high black and white socks and black mary janes, and square frame glasses on his face. Bronk was wearing Tori's white t-shirt with a yellow decal and a pink skirt, and black socks that went up to his knees and sneakers, and even a red ribbon in his hair. Caswell was wearing Sei's blue shirt and orange hooded vest, a denim miniskirt, and knee-high boots. Flip was dressed in Sachi's open pink cardigan and yellow dress, and a pink bow in the back of his hair. And last for the boys, Rei was dressed in Rio's pink shirt and a white sleeveless shirt with a sailor scarf at the neck, white miniskirt, and her black thigh-high stockings on.

As for the girls, Tori wore Bronk's orange t-shirt with a face-like decal on it which also was revealing the bottom of her stomach, and blue pants with black suspenders, as well as a backwards baseball cap. Cathy wore Shark's dark purple jacket over maroon shirt and dark blue pants. Anna was wearing Yuma's red vest over a purple shirt with a green "D" symbol, and white pants. Rio and Sei were wearing the uniforms of Caswell and Rei, which the two seemed to always wear, even as casual clothing. And lastly, Sachi wore Flip's blue coat over his frilled shirt, blue pants, his big red bow-tie, and his hat.
